snippet: A U.N. official said that staff members learned that the soldier had abused a girl who was believed to be in her mid- to late teens and that she gave birth to a child.
abstract: United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Zeid Ra'ad al-Hussein announces another UN peacekeeper in Central African Republic has been accused of sexually abusing a teenage girl, who later gave birth to a child.
lead_paragraph: A U.N. official said that staff members learned that the soldier had abused a girl who was believed to be in her mid- to late teens and that she gave birth to a child.

headline.main: French Soldier Accused of Sexual Abuse in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: New Abuse Claim in Central Africa
